subject: Preakness Stakes
Horses
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: D. Wayne Lukas no longer has hundreds of horses in his charge, but he still pops up and wins important races. He hopes the Preakness Stakes will be the next one.
snippet: D. Wayne Lukas no longer has hundreds of horses in his charge, but he still pops up and wins important races. He hopes the Preakness Stakes will be the next one.
